name: mockazon
author: Lukas Teixeira Doepcke <lteixeir@ucsc.edu>, Evan Metcalf <evmetcal@ucsc.edu>, Eesha Krishnamagaru <elkrishn@ucsc.edu>, Hunter Tratar <htratar@ucsc.edu>, Trevor Ryles <tryles@ucsc.edu>

scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-auth-up && npm run docker-order-up && npm run docker-product-up && npm run docker-key-up
scripts.docker-down: npm run docker-auth-down && npm run docker-order-down && npm run docker-product-down && npm run docker-key-down
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-admin && npm run install-auth && npm run install-order && npm run install-shopper && npm run install-product && npm run install-vendor-app && npm run install-vendor-api && npm run install-key
scripts.devs: npm run docker-up && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev-admin" "npm run dev-auth" "npm run dev-order" "npm run dev-shopper" "npm run dev-product" "npm run dev-vendor-app" "npm run dev-vendor-api" "npm run dev-key"
scripts.lint-vendor: cd "VendorAPI" && npm run lint & cd "VendorApp" && npm run lint
scripts.lints: npm run lint-admin && npm run lint-auth && npm run lint-key && npm run lint-order && npm run lint-product && npm run lint-shopper && npm run lint-vendor
scripts.containerized: npm run installs && npm run builds && docker-compose up --build
scripts.builds: npm run build-admin && npm run build-auth && npm run build-key && npm run build-order && npm run build-product && npm run build-shopper && npm run build-vendorapi && npm run build-vendorapp
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-admin && npm run ci-auth && npm run ci-key && npm run ci-order && npm run ci-product && npm run ci-shopper && npm run ci-vendorapi && npm run ci-vendorapp
scripts.ms-cis: npm ci && npm run ci-auth && npm run ci-order && npm run ci-product && npm run ci-key
scripts.starts: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-admin" "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-key" "npm run start-order" "npm run start-product" "npm run start-shopper" "npm run start-vendorapi" "npm run start-vendorapp"
scripts.ms-starts: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-auth" "npm run start-order" "npm run start-product" "npm run start-key"
scripts.test-vendor: cd VendorAPI && npm test && cd VendorApp && npm test
scripts.tests: npm run test-admin && npm run test-auth && npm run test-key && npm run test-order && npm run test-product && npm run test-shopper && npm run test-vendor
